metadata.synopsis: Half-Orc at the edge of the shadow curse. Stoic and focused on the job.

0.speaker: Bedi
0.text: Stay sharp. These shadows can sneak up on you.

1.speaker: Bedi
1.text: Don't wander into the dark. It's hungry.
1.context: NodeContext: 'It's hungry' referring to the 'dark' itself. Figuratively, but also the darkness is cursed and will kill you.
